name: Higher education R&D expenditures received from and passed through to other U.S. higher education institutions, at institutions in the short form survey population, by state, institutional control, institution, and source of funds: FY 2019
description: Higher education R&D expenditures received from and passed through to other U.S. higher education institutions, at institutions in the short form survey population, by state, institutional control, institution, and source of funds: FY 2019

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_state_institutional_control_and_institution_b
variableMeasured.description: State, institutional control, and institution hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_received_as_a_subrecipient_federally_financed
variableMeasured.description: Received As A Subrecipient Federally Financed

variableMeasured.name: field_received_as_a_subrecipient_nonfederally_financed
variableMeasured.description: Received As A Subrecipient Nonfederally Financed

variableMeasured.name: field_passed_through_to_subrecipients_federally_financed
variableMeasured.description: Passed Through To Subrecipients Federally Financed

variableMeasured.name: field_passed_through_to_subrecipients_nonfederally_financed
variableMeasured.description: Passed Through To Subrecipients Nonfederally Financed

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Institutions are included in the short form population if they reported less than $1 million in total R&D expenditures during the previous fiscal year.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Higher Education Research and Development Survey, FY 2019.
